item.title: sqlite
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. Sqlite installation 进入D:/software/sqlite目录并打开sqlite3命令。它将如下所示： tar xvfz sqlite-autoconf-3071502.tar.gz cd sqlite-autoconf-3071502 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local make make install #----- usage # 创建数据库 sqlite3 DatabaseName.db #退出 sqlite> .quit

item.title: Flask_BookManageSystem
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. DOM 在 HTML DOM (Document Object Model) 中 , 每
